title: Electric force - 3 particles Q and point charge q

content.question: Three identical particles, each with the same charge <math alttext="positive uppercase Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></math>, are arranged in a vertical line with a spacing <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> between adjacent particles, as shown in the figure. What is the net electrostatic force exerted on a point charge of charge <math alttext="positive lowercase q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi></mpadded></math> located the same distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> to the right of the middle particle?

choices.label: <math alttext="k times the fraction with numerator lowercase q times uppercase Q, and denominator D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, 1 plus the fraction with numerator the square root of 2 and denominator 2, close parenthesis, times k, times the fraction with numerator lowercase q times uppercase Q, and denominator D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="2 k times the fraction with numerator lowercase q times uppercase Q, and denominator D squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="3 k times the fraction with numerator lowercase q times uppercase Q, and denominator D squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, 1 plus the fraction with numerator the square root of 2 and denominator 2, close parenthesis, times k, times the fraction with numerator lowercase q times uppercase Q, and denominator D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mpadded></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
